translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「同じく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Same here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、えーえー、その通りです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yeah, that's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴ら思いのほかに強く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're stronger than I thought,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今まで気絶していた次第で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that's why I had been unconscious until now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………言い訳はせん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I won't make any excuses."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アァアアアアァ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "AAAaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苛立ち紛れに放たれた巨大な拳は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge fist, thrown out in frustration,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまたま最後に喋った骸骨王モドカタに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: happened to strike the Skeleton King Modokata who spoke last.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振るわれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was wielded at him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生きてるじゃねぇか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're still alive, aren't you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きてるだろうがテメェ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're still alive, damn you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺を守る門番なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're a gatekeeper protecting me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主の為に死んでも俺を守れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then protect me even if you die for your master!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア！？　何故それすら出来ねぇ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? Why can't you even do that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様なんか守る価値もねぇってか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You think I'm not even worth protecting!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それとも俺を馬鹿にしてるのか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or are you mocking me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿にしているな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're mocking me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェはそういう奴だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's the kind of guy you are!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死にやがれクソがァアァァァ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Die, you bastard!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渾身の力を込めた拳のラッシュが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flurry of punches filled with all his might

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モドカタの体を粉々に粉砕する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shattered Modokata's body to pieces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後には意味を成さない声を漏らし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, he let out a meaningless voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為す術なく、モドカタは絶命した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and helplessly, Modokata died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, hah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、前からコイツは気に入らなかったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, I've disliked this guy for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 丁度いい処分になったぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This turned out to be the perfect way to deal with him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、テメェらもこうなりたくなきゃ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen up, if you guys don't want to end up like this—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の面々に振り返ったケイブリスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kavebris glanced back at the others and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眉をひそめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knitted his brows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おい、なんのつもりだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, what do you think you're doing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍マックス、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Max,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物ざむらいアバシリの両名が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Monster Samurai Abashiri,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに向けて武器を構えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both took up weapons and aimed them at Kavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見て分かんねぇか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can't you see?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛想が尽きたんだよ、てめぇには」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're done being nice to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「モドカタは我にとって友でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Modokata was a friend to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「友を殺されてまで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't show loyalty to you after my friend was killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方に尽くす忠はございません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no duty to serve you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白ぇなぁ……ええ、おい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How amusing... hey, you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物将軍と魔物隊長風情が、あ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A monster general and a monster captain, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に少しでも勝てると思ったか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you think you could win against me even a little?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなに俺ァ弱そうだったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did I look that weak to you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ならば、この一刀、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Then consider this one strike

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辞表の代わりと思って頂きたく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as my resignation letter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来ねぇのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aren't you coming?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか臆したなんて言わねぇよな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You wouldn't say you chickened out, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ジョークにしちゃ……笑えねぇな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's no joke... not funny at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは数秒にも満たない戦いだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a battle that lasted less than a few seconds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの巨体が二人に突撃した途端、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Kavebris's giant body charged at the two,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 室内に巨大な嵐が吹き荒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a massive storm raged through the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 咆哮と共に暴れるケイブリスが二人の戦士を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kavebris rampaged with a roar, and the two warriors

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっという間に無惨なバラバラ死体に変えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were swiftly turned into gruesome dismembered corpses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……っ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無論、最後に立っているのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, the last one standing was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス一人だけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only Kavebris.
"...Pathetic."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: happened to strike the Skeleton King Modokata who spoke last.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「生きてるじゃねぇか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're still alive, aren't you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生きてるだろうがテメェ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're still alive, damn you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺を守る門番なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're a gatekeeper protecting me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主の為に死んでも俺を守れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then protect me even if you die for your master!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア！？　何故それすら出来ねぇ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? Why can't you even do that!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様なんか守る価値もねぇってか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You think I'm not even worth protecting!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それとも俺を馬鹿にしてるのか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or are you mocking me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿にしているな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're mocking me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェはそういう奴だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's the kind of guy you are!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死にやがれクソがァアァァァ！！！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Die, you bastard!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 渾身の力を込めた拳のラッシュが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flurry of punches filled with all his might

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モドカタの体を粉々に粉砕する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shattered Modokata's body to pieces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後には意味を成さない声を漏らし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, he let out a meaningless voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為す術なく、モドカタは絶命した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and helplessly, Modokata died.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, hah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、前からコイツは気に入らなかったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, I've disliked this guy for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 丁度いい処分になったぜ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This turned out to be the perfect way to deal with him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか、テメェらもこうなりたくなきゃ――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen up, if you guys don't want to end up like this—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の面々に振り返ったケイブリスが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kavebris glanced back at the others and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眉をひそめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: knitted his brows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おい、なんのつもりだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, what do you think you're doing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍マックス、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster General Max,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物ざむらいアバシリの両名が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Monster Samurai Abashiri,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに向けて武器を構えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both took up weapons and aimed them at Kavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見て分かんねぇか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can't you see?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛想が尽きたんだよ、てめぇには」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're done being nice to you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「モドカタは我にとって友でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Modokata was a friend to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「友を殺されてまで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't show loyalty to you after my friend was killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方に尽くす忠はございません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no duty to serve you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白ぇなぁ……ええ、おい？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How amusing... hey, you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物将軍と魔物隊長風情が、あ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A monster general and a monster captain, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に少しでも勝てると思ったか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you think you could win against me even a little?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなに俺ァ弱そうだったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did I look that weak to you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ならば、この一刀、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Then consider this one strike

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辞表の代わりと思って頂きたく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as my resignation letter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来ねぇのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aren't you coming?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか臆したなんて言わねぇよな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You wouldn't say you chickened out, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ジョークにしちゃ……笑えねぇな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's no joke... not funny at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは数秒にも満たない戦いだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a battle that lasted less than a few seconds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの巨体が二人に突撃した途端、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment Kavebris's giant body charged at the two,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 室内に巨大な嵐が吹き荒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a massive storm raged through the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 咆哮と共に暴れるケイブリスが二人の戦士を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kavebris rampaged with a roar, and the two warriors

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっという間に無惨なバラバラ死体に変えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were swiftly turned into gruesome dismembered corpses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……っ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無論、最後に立っているのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, the last one standing was

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス一人だけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: only Kavebris.
"...Pathetic."
